zh.title: 苏联宪法正式生效，巩固一党制
阿基莱·劳罗号邮轮被巴勒斯坦解放阵线劫持
托尼·莫里森获诺贝尔文学奖
印度奥里萨邦遭遇超级气旋，造成重大伤亡
阿诺·施瓦辛格当选加州州长
柬埔寨国王西哈努克正式退位
安娜·波利特科夫斯卡娅在莫斯科遇害
委内瑞拉总统查韦斯再次赢得总统选举
国际奥委会投票决定2020年奥运会在东京举办

en.title: Hua Guofeng succeeds Mao Zedong as Chairman of the CCP.
Achille Lauro hijacking ends after negotiations with PLO.
Toni Morrison wins the Nobel Prize in Literature.
Yen slides amid financial crisis fears in Asia.
The US and UK begin military operations in Afghanistan.
Arnold Schwarzenegger is elected Governor of California.
Egypt holds its first multi-candidate presidential election.
Hugo Chavez wins Venezuelan presidential election.
Raqqa, Syria, is liberated from ISIS control.
Nobel Peace Prize awarded to Narges Mohammadi.
